attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am writing this letter to raise my concern and issue.  I am born rise in Hong Kong.  In 1997 I have applied for British citizenship which was refused base on saying that I am not a ordinarily resident of hong kong.  After 9 years there was a good news came and I send a letter to Hong Kong British Consulate requesting reconsideration of my application again because I truly believed I am entitle to the British citizenship.
 
When I read the requirement, I am total eligible to apply and get my Citizenship.
 
1st requirement is I have to be a ordinarily resident of HK on the date, I did not came back to HK knowing that British accepting the Indian.  I only found out when I came back to HK and one of my staff told me. ( There are also exception for being absence from HK)
 
2nd I was in HK at the time of application.
 
3rd I do not have any other country's nationality except BNO.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
